mapper.select: select * from ( SELECT su.user_flow,su.user_name,su.dept_flow,su.dept_name, (SELECT COUNT(ecc.customer_flow) FROM erp_crm_customer ecc WHERE ecc.CREATE_TIME >= #{startDate} and ecc.CREATE_TIME <= #{endDate} AND su.USER_FLOW=ecc.CREATE_USER_FLOW AND ecc.RECORD_STATUS='Y' GROUP BY ecc.CREATE_USER_FLOW ) as newCustomerNum, (SELECT COUNT(eccu.user_flow) FROM erp_crm_customer_user eccu WHERE eccu.CREATE_TIME >= #{startDate} and eccu.CREATE_TIME <= #{endDate} AND su.USER_FLOW=eccu.CREATE_USER_FLOW AND eccu.RECORD_STATUS='Y' GROUP BY eccu.CREATE_USER_FLOW ) as newCustomerUserNum FROM sys_user su WHERE su.status_id='Activated' ) where newCustomerNum is not null or newCustomerUserNum is not null ORDER BY NLSSORT(dept_name, 'NLS_SORT = SCHINESE_PINYIN_M'),NLSSORT(user_name, 'NLS_SORT = SCHINESE_PINYIN_M')

select * from pdsci.erp_crm_customer_user where record_status!='D'
and user_flow in
#{item}
order by record_status desc nulls last,is_main desc nulls last,NLSSORT(USER_NAME,'NLS_SORT = SCHINESE_PINYIN_M')
select count(*) from pdsci.erp_crm_customer where record_status='Y' and customer_flow in( select distinct(customer_flow) from pdsci.erp_crm_contract where record_status='Y' )

select from ( SELECT erp_crm_customer_user.*,to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')||'-'||to_char(to_date(birthday,'yyyy-mm-dd')-7,'mm-dd') preDay, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')||'-'||to_char(to_date(birthday,'yyyy-mm-dd') ,'mm-dd') briDay, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')nowDay from erp_crm_customer_user where record_status='Y' and BIRTHDAY is not null) a where a.nowday between a.preday and a.briday
